embeddedItem.name: Enhancement Paste: Ice
embeddedItem.desc: Upon use, increases Ice DMG of all allies by <nobr>24%</nobr> for the next battle.
embeddedItem.lore:
A cream made from a mixture of Path materials and other things.
Apply it to the right weapon to boost combat effectiveness.

"Half the effort, double the result."

29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

72045.name: Core of Ice
72045.lore:
Shattered ice fallen from the stars.
The frosty mist it emits when removed from a specialized canister looks like the breath of wintertime.

"Zoom in on a snowflake 100 times and behold the wonder of nature."
comeFrom: Corridor of Fading Echoes: Everwinter Shadewalkers or other enemies

356541.name: Tree Bark of Erudition
356541.lore:
Dried tree bark that seems to possess the power of the Erudition.
Its creases tell the story of the years passed and the wisdom of nature.
It says a lot more when beaten into pulp used for papermaking.

"The wisdom of mankind is contained in this one word."
comeFrom: Robot Settlement: Automatons or other enemies

440416.name: Solid Water
440416.lore:
Compound composed of hydrogen and oxygen, essential to support carbon-based life.
Keeping it in the solid state makes it easy to carry.

"...Isn't it ice?"
"No, no, no. Ice is ice, this is water, just in the solid state."
"...Isn't that the definition of ice?"
comeFrom: Storage Zone: Baryons or other enemies
Found in destructible objects in Jarilo-VI

557865.name: Recipe: Enhancement Paste: Ice
557865.desc: A simple equation. When entered into the Synthesizer, it will unlock a new recipe.
